text: "Animals" is a 2014 song by American pop rock band Maroon 5 and is the second single from their fifth studio album V. It went to number 2 in Canada and Slovakia, number 3 in the Czech Republic and the United States, number 4 in Finland and Poland, number 5 in Israel and Mexico, number 7 in South Africa, number 8 in Hungary and Italy, number 11 in Germany and New Zealand, number 12 in South Korea and Spain, number 15 in Denmark and Sweden, number 17 in Sweden and number 18 in the Netherlands and Switzerland. It charted poorly in Australia where it made #62. == Track listing == * Digital download # "Animals" – 3:51 * Digital download – Remix featuring J. Cole # "Animals" (Remix) (featuring J. Cole) – 4:00 Category:2014 songs Category:Maroon 5 songs Category:Dance-pop songs
title: Animals (Maroon 5 song)
